Title: Test Analyst with banking experience
Description: Do you have Test Analyst experience, and are you seeking a new job in Zürich? Cognizant is looking for Test Analysts. Number of positions: 2 12 months fixed term contract Full time office role To give you an idea of how this Test Analyst role would look and feel, here are some of the things you could expect to do: · Analyse the requirements and document the test cases and scenarios · Present test evidence to the business · Execute the UAT testing concept for data migration · Establish and monitor measures related to testing, providing insights to the project and senior management · Report to different levels of product owners and walk through the test analysis To apply for this Test Analyst role, your soft skills, expertise and experience should include: · 4+ years of experience in the banking domain with UAT experience covering all testing aspects of the SDLC, including reporting · 3+ years experience working in banking and financial services with an agile mindset, 5-6 years overall experience in testing · Excellent work experience on SQL and experience UAT end to end test activities · Experience with JIRA (XRAY is a plus), Data migration As a vital member of our team and in return for your expertise, inclusive approach and commitment, we'll provide a favourable salary and the chance to join a passionate and welcoming team. At Cognizant, taking care of employees is a priority: · You can pursue innovative career tracks and opportunities here · You can enhance your professional development through education and dedicated training · We’ll give you the skills you need to keep pace with the changing workplace while our compensation, benefits and wellness packages help you stay healthy and plan for the future. Don't hesitate to please get in touch with our Cognizant's team today to apply and register your interest for this full-time Test Analyst position in Zürich. We're looking forward to meeting you. At Cognizant, we engineer modern businesses to improve everyday life because we're dedicated to making a lasting impact. Cognizant (Nasdaq: CTSH) engineers modern businesses. We help our clients modernize technology, reimagine processes and transform experiences so they can stay ahead in our fast-changing world. Together, we're improving everyday life. Location: New York, NY-550 W 34th St, New York, United States
Title: Business Analyst/ Product owner (SWIFT, ISO 20022  Projects)
Description: Business Analyst/ Product owner (SWIFT ISO 20022 Projects) Banking & Financial Services Consulting Location: New York City ABOUT US Cognizant is one of the world's leading professional services companies, transforming clients' business, operating, and technology models for the digital era. Our unique industry-based, consultative approach helps clients envision, build, and run more innovative and efficient businesses. Cognizant is headquartered in the U.S. Learn how Cognizant helps clients lead with digital at www.cognizant.com. COGNIZANT CONSULTING Within Cognizant is Cognizant Consulting, a global consulting organization delivering strategic and domain consulting through industry and technology expertise. With over 6,000 consultants worldwide, Cognizant offers high-value consulting services that improve business performance and operational productivity, lower operational expenses and enhance overall performance. Clients draw upon our deep industry expertise, program and change management capabilities, and analytical objectivity to help improve business productivity, drive technology-enabled business transformation and increase shareholder value. We provide a number of Business/IT Consulting Services including Business Strategy, IT Strategy & Roadmap Development, Process Re-Engineering & Transformation, Enterprise Architecture & Technology Selection, and Domain Solutions. The Cognizant Consulting team is a high performing organization that is continually expanding our client base and increasingly being recommended by analysts such as Forrester and Gartner. And we’re growing! The Role Our Banking & Financial Services Consulting group is looking for a Business Analyst / Product owner to join our journey. We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Product/ BA focusing on financial messaging standards, particularly ISO 20022 with payments background We’re looking for Consultants who can deliver within Cognizant’s Five Pillars of Consulting: 1) Project Execution, 2) Expertise, 3) Business Development, 4) Practice Development, & 5) People Development. As a Consultant, this means creating high-quality client deliverables and taking ownership (with supervision) of producing client content and meeting client expectations; developing an expertise in your functional area, including obtaining certifications; contributing to Client Satisfaction and/or RFPs; supporting leadership and contributing to content development for service offerings; and participating in PeopleCare initiatives and exhibiting personal leadership at all times. In addition to enabling consulting excellence through the Five Pillars of Consulting, the specific requirements for this position are below. Our solutions are in demand and we’re passionate about making a difference. If you have experience with the above, are a selfless leader, and are committed to client-facing environment; if you want to grow your career with a team that wants to build something great together, we want to hear from you! Apply now! Responsibilities · Define, prioritize, and manage the product backlog for SWIFT payments and ISO20022 initiatives. · Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and refine product requirements. · Conduct in-depth analysis of business processes, workflows, and data requirements related to SWIFT payments and ISO20022. · Gather requirements from business units and translate those to developers and architects and testers · Documents functional requirements (in the form of user stories), analyzes requirements in the context of software and processes · Possess a deep understanding of SWIFT payments, ISO20022 standards, and related financial messaging protocols. · Stay up-to-date with industry trends, regulatory changes, and emerging technologies. · Data analysis and coordinate with QA and UAT teams · Work with development and support teams on production issues as needed · Working with the product/business team and end-users to deliver functionalities while maintaining quality. · Refining business requirements, prioritizing the product and sprint backlogs into actionable stories. · Act as a liaison between product teams, business users and technical teams to deliver tangible outcomes Qualifications · Bachelor’s degree in business, Finance, Computer Science, or a related field. · An MBA or related advanced degree is a plus. · 5 years of Business Analyst/ Product Owner with payments background –(SWIFT ISO 20022 projects) in banking & financial services industry · Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively with both technical teams and business stakeholders. · Strong understanding of financial messaging standards, particularly ISO 20022. · Experience with payment systems and financial messaging platforms. · Experience with business requirements gathering and documentation. · Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. · Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced and dynamic environment. · Experience in Agile methodologies · Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities. Knowledge of current trends and developments in the payments industry. · Personal leadership and a desire to create a culture that enables exceptional outcomes · The embodiment of Cognizant’s Core Values of: Work as one, Raise the bar, Dare to innovate, Do the right thing, Own it Work Authorization · Cognizant will only consider applicants for this position who are legally authorized to work in the United States without company sponsorship (H-1B, L-1B, L-1A, etc.) Salary and Other Compensation The annual salary for this position is between $64,000 - $100,000 depending on experience and other qualifications of the successful candidate. Benefits Cognizant offers the following benefits for this position, subject to applicable eligibility requirements: Medical/Dental/Vision/Life Insurance Paid holidays plus Paid Time Off 401(k) plan contributions Long-term/Short-term Disability Paid Parental Leave Employee Stock Purchase Plan Disclaimer: The salary, other compensation, and benefits information is accurate as of the date of this position. Title: Technical Product Manager
Description: Location: Poland, Remote What we do: As Top Employer, we are dedicated to helping the world's leading companies build stronger businesses — helping them go from doing digital to being digital. Cognizant Poland offices are in Gdansk, Wroclaw, and Kraków. With the capacity to support various clients, we offer a world of opportunities for both professionals and graduates. You can expect five-star training, a chance to realize your career goals, and a range of benefits. Be Cognizant! About the role: We are seeking a Technically oriented Product Manager to lead our new product development team in Warsaw. This role involves shaping the vision for the team and driving product development. Responsibilities: Collaborate with engineering to translate business requirements into technical user stories. Prioritize the backlog with business and engineering peers. Facilitate stand-ups, grooming sessions, and retrospectives. Design and modify API contracts. Align roadmaps and expectations with global product teams. Engage with clients and customer-facing teams to gather feedback. Key Duties: Provide business context to engineering teams to guide product goals. Build reliable and scalable digital commerce experiences with engineering teams. Define detailed user stories for complex features. Ensure technical specifications and final products meet business requirements. Partner with business operations and analytics teams to build monitoring capabilities. Work with sales and support teams to identify pilot customers and integrate feedback. Ensure product vision supports global launch with minimal adjustments. Perform Go-To-Market activities with various stakeholders. Essential Skills: Strong technical skills and understanding of system architecture. Experience leading product and delivery scrum teams. Excellent communication skills to bridge business and engineering teams. Experience designing web and backend APIs. What we offer: Opportunity to be part of a global organization focused on development. Open-minded and multinational environment Training & development opportunities Professional development and clear career path acquainted Employee referral program in place Extensive benefits package For more information about us, visit Cognizant Poland. Title: Business Analyst-Analytics
Description: Job Summary We are seeking a Business Analyst-Analytics with 1 to 3 years of experience to join our team. The ideal candidate will have expertise in MS Power Automate and Automation Anywhere. This hybrid role requires proficiency in Spanish and English with a focus on driving business insights and process automation. Domain experience in Drilling and Development is a plus. Responsibilities Analyze business processes to identify opportunities for automation and improvement. Develop and implement automation solutions using MS Power Automate and Automation Anywhere. Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and document business requirements. Provide data-driven insights to support decision-making processes. Create detailed reports and dashboards to visualize business performance. Conduct regular reviews of automation processes to ensure efficiency and effectiveness. Work closely with IT and other departments to integrate automation solutions. Ensure compliance with company policies and industry regulations. Train and support end-users on new automation tools and processes. Monitor and troubleshoot automation workflows to resolve any issues. Participate in project planning and execution to meet business objectives. Communicate effectively with team members and stakeholders in both Spanish and English. Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in automation and analytics. Qualifications Possess a strong understanding of MS Power Automate and Automation Anywhere. Demonstrate excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. Exhibit proficiency in Spanish and English for effective communication. Have experience in creating reports and dashboards for business insights. Show ability to work collaboratively in a hybrid work model. Display knowledge of Drilling and Development domain is a plus. Hold a bachelors degree in a relevant field or equivalent experience. Be detail-oriented with strong organizational skills. Show capability to train and support end-users on new tools. Demonstrate ability to monitor and troubleshoot automation workflows. Exhibit strong documentation and requirement-gathering skills. Stay proactive in learning new technologies and industry trends. Have experience in project planning and execution. Certifications Required Certified Automation Anywhere Professional Microsoft Power Automate Certification The Cognizant community: We are a high caliber team who appreciate and support one another. Location: Warsaw, MA - Wola Center, Mazowieckie, Poland
Title: On-site IT Support Engineer
Description: Location: On-site from Warsaw office (2 shifts) What we do: At Cognizant, we are dedicated to helping the world's leading companies build stronger businesses — helping them go from doing digital to being digital. In Poland, our offices are in Gdańsk, Wroclaw, and Kraków. However the proposed offer is based in the Client’s office in Warsaw. With the capacity to support various clients, we offer a world of opportunities for both professionals and graduates. You can expect five-star training, a chance to realize your career goals, and a range of benefits. Be Cognizant! About the role: We are currently looking for On-site IT Support Technician willing to assist each line of the business from the technical perspective on the shift basis. Main responsibilities: Serving as the first point of contact for customers seeking technical assistance in person at support locations. Providing Level 1 support to IT users for basic software and hardware of end-user computing and desktop-based LAN systems. Providing technical advice, guidance and informal training using hardware and software programs. Troubleshooting and restoring routine technical service and equipment problems by analyzing, identifying and diagnosing faults nd symptoms using established processes and procedures. Developing an understanding of appropriate procedures, policies, practices, and systems. Performing remote troubleshooting through diagnostic techniques and pertinent questions. Directing unresolved issues to the next level of support personnel. Providing accurate information on IT products or services. Recording events and problems and their resolution in internal ticketing systems. Follow-up and update customer status and information. Collaborating with Field service team troubleshooting video conferencing equipment and inspection of video conferencing spaces and technical support of event spaces and events. Co-ordinating with Third party vendors to replace parts (or) fix issues with hardware. Performing Asset management HAM & SAM. Key requirements: Proven experience as a help desk technician or IT support technician Strong understanding and troubleshooting resolution skills of computer systems, mobile devices and other tech products including mobile device management (MDM), iOS/ Android, Mac, Windows, and Linux operating systems. Ability to diagnose and resolve basic to moderately complex end-user technical issues Proficiency in English, excellent task management, verbal, and written communication skills Customer-oriented technical professional Technical support professional with proven commercial experience in the IT technical support field focused on end-user support We offer: Competitive salary with cafeteria benefits and bonuses Opportunity to be part of a rapidly expanding global organization Pleasant and inspiring working atmosphere Professional development and clear career path Training & development opportunities Private healthcare and additional life insurance Employee volunteering programs and opportunities Inclusion and diversity in practice Employee referral program in place For more information about us, visit Cognizant Poland. Title: Sr. Associate - Projects

Title: AS400 Developer
Description: Job Summary We are seeking a highly skilled Technical Lead with 5 to 7 years of experience in IT Service Management DB2/400 CLP and AS400/COBOL. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Merchandising and will work from our office during day shifts. This role does not require travel. The Technical Lead will play a crucial role in driving technical excellence and ensuring the success of our IT projects. Responsibilities Lead the development and implementation of IT Service Management solutions to enhance operational efficiency. Oversee the maintenance and optimization of DB2/400 databases to ensure data integrity and performance. Provide technical expertise in CLP scripting to automate and streamline business processes. Develop and maintain AS400/COBOL applications to support merchandising operations. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and design technical solutions that align with business objectives. Ensure the timely delivery of high-quality software solutions by adhering to best practices and industry standards. Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members to promote continuous improvement. Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues to minimize downtime and ensure seamless operations. Mentor and guide junior developers to foster a culture of learning and growth within the team. Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to drive innovation and improve existing systems. Coordinate with stakeholders to prioritize tasks and manage project timelines effectively. Document technical specifications and create user manuals to facilitate knowledge transfer and training. Ensure compliance with security and regulatory requirements to protect sensitive data and maintain system integrity. Qualifications Possess a strong background in IT Service Management with hands-on experience in implementing and managing ITSM solutions. Demonstrate expertise in DB2/400 database management including performance tuning and optimization. Have extensive experience in CLP scripting for automating business processes. Show proficiency in developing and maintaining AS400/COBOL applications. Exhibit domain knowledge in Merchandising to understand and address business needs effectively. Display excellent problem-solving skills to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues promptly. Possess strong communication skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders. Demonstrate the ability to mentor and guide junior developers to enhance team performance. Stay updated with industry trends and technologies to drive continuous improvement. Ensure compliance with security and regulatory requirements to protect sensitive data. Have a proactive approach to identifying and addressing potential risks and challenges. Show a commitment to delivering high-quality software solutions within established timelines. Exhibit strong organizational skills to manage multiple tasks and projects effectively. Certifications Required ITIL Certification IBM Certified Database Administrator - DB2 COBOL Programming Certification. Title: Senior Director -Regional Lead, SAP
Description: Cognizant (Nasdaq: CTSH) engineers modern businesses. We help our clients modernize technology, reimagine processes and transform experiences so they can stay ahead in our fast-changing world. Together, we're improving everyday life. See how at www.cognizant.com or @cognizant. Our Culture Your passion, integrity and experience are integral to Cognizant's success. You will be welcomed into a dynamic and expanding global leader in IT and Business Consultancy. We take pride in our partnership with our clients, so your ability to add value and provide exceptional service to our clients are fundamental to your success. In return, you will be empowered with opportunities to develop your career and collaborate with talented colleagues in a supportive, diverse environment. At Cognizant we recognize that companies that are open and welcoming to a multi-cultural diverse workforce will thrive with fresh perspectives and collaborative knowledge. Cognizant is focused on promoting & increasing gender diversity and providing a workplace which encourages great participation and an equal playing field, where merit and accomplishment are the only criteria for success. As part of a truly global company, you will have the ability to grow and learn in a diverse, collaborative culture. We foster relationships and learning through connected global and local teams, promote flexible and diverse career paths and support the development of your knowledge and skills. Key Responsibilities: As a Regional Lead for SAP, you will be the primary interface for market deal pursuits, responsible for crafting and executing the overall vision and strategy. You will provide thought leadership, develop practice roadmaps, and drive offering development. Your role includes influencing complex solution design, pre-sales, innovation, and partner management. You will work closely with market units to secure strategic opportunities and achieve revenue targets, shape deals through your network with partner channel leads, regional leads, and domain executives, and guide budgetary matters, project governance, and risk mitigation for complex transformation programs. In this Regional Lead role, you can expect to: · Leverage experience as a Service Integrator to enhance service delivery and integration. · Manage relationships with vendors and build a strong network within the SAP community across various industries. · Engage and communicate effectively with C-Suite executives from a customer standpoint. · Apply experience in cloud migration, preferably in at least one industry such as Public Sector & Health. · Initiate conversations with customers embarking on the SAP Modernization journey to S/4HANA. · Lead and drive S/4HANA Assessments to develop customer roadmaps for SAP Modernization to S/4HANA. · Design successful and differentiating solutions for customers on their SAP Modernization journey to S/4HANA. · Lead multidisciplinary teams, including consulting, testing, integrations, cloud enablement, and change management, as part of solution leadership for RFPs. · Present Cognizant’s offerings and key accelerators to customers and opportunities. · Demonstrate industry domain and process leadership skills in customer conversations to build trust. · Support business development and pre-sales activities by providing technical expertise, solution demos, proposals, and estimations. · Understand consulting and SAP methodology, user-centric design, and generate actionable and impactful roadmaps that engage the organization to achieve strategic milestones. · Leverage deep package expertise in functional/practice areas to address customer needs, create proof of concepts, and credentialize solutions. · Communicate effectively across stakeholders with deep knowledge of IT services/IT outsourcing globally. · Analyse sales opportunities and qualify leads and opportunities. · Articulate vision and lead effective teams across the enterprise with strong executive communication skills, productively challenging counterparts and bringing valuable insights. · Manage relationships with executive leadership and business units, aligning stakeholders to strategic plans and mediating conflicts with outstanding interpersonal abilities. · Exhibit excellent organizational and leadership skills to build a strong strategy function and lead by example, with strong project management, budgeting, talent management, and business operations skills. Title: Sr. Associate - Projects
Description: Job Summary We are seeking a Sr. Developer with 4 to 8 years of experience to join our team. The ideal candidate will have expertise in AWS CloudFormation ML Ops AWS Machine Learning Docker AI & ML Concepts Machine Learning Artificial Intelligence Amazon Sagemaker Kubernetes Terraform and GIT. Experience in the Bioinformatics domain is mandatory. This role is based in our office and operates during day shifts. Responsibilities Develop and maintain scalable machine learning models using AWS Machine Learning and Amazon Sagemaker. Implement and manage infrastructure as code using AWS CloudFormation and Terraform. Design and deploy containerized applications using Docker and Kubernetes. Collaborate with bioinformatics experts to integrate AI and ML solutions into bioinformatics workflows. Optimize machine learning pipelines for performance and scalability. Ensure the security and compliance of machine learning models and data. Provide technical guidance and support to junior developers and team members. Conduct code reviews and ensure adherence to best practices in software development. Utilize GIT for version control and collaborative development. Implement ML Ops practices to streamline the deployment and monitoring of machine learning models. Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI ML and bioinformatics. Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to machine learning models and infrastructure. Contribute to the continuous improvement of development processes and tools. Qualifications Possess a strong understanding of AWS CloudFormation and Terraform for infrastructure management. Demonstrate expertise in ML Ops and the deployment of machine learning models. Have hands-on experience with Docker and Kubernetes for container orchestration. Show proficiency in AI & ML concepts and their application in bioinformatics. Be skilled in using Amazon Sagemaker for developing and deploying machine learning models. Exhibit strong knowledge of GIT for version control. Have a background in bioinformatics and its related technologies. Be capable of working collaboratively in a team environment. Display excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills. Stay current with industry trends and advancements in AI and ML. Possess strong communication and documentation skills. Be detail-oriented and committed to delivering high-quality solutions. Have a proactive approach to learning and professional development. Certifications Required AWS Certified Machine Learning Docker Certified Associate Kubernetes Certification GIT Certification The Cognizant community: We are a high caliber team who appreciate and support one another.
